Package com.patiun.library.service

Interface BookOrderService

All Known Implementing Classes:
BookOrderServiceImpl
public interface BookOrderService
This interface is concerned with using DAO objects to get BookOrders from the database and performing logical operations with them

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    advanceOrderState(Long orderId, Long userId, RentalState newState)
    Sets new state for BookOrder in the database
    BookOrder
    getOrderById(Long id)
    Gets the BookOrder with the specified id
    List<BookOrder>
    getSpecifiedOrders(Specification<BookOrder> bookOrderSpecification, Comparator<BookOrder> comparator)
    Returns BookOrders from the database, which fit the passed specification, in a List sorted with the passed Comparator
    void
    placeOrder(int numberOfDays, RentalType rentalType, Long bookId, Long userId)
    Uses DAO objects to save the BookOrder

  • Method Details

    • placeOrder

      void placeOrder(int numberOfDays, RentalType rentalType, Long bookId, Long userId) throws ServiceException, ValidationException
      Uses DAO objects to save the BookOrder
      Parameters:
      numberOfDays - integer representing the length of the order in days
      rentalType - type of the BookOrder
      bookId - id of the Book in the database related to the BookOrder
      userId - id of the User in the database related to the BookOrder
      Throws:
      ServiceException - if a DaoException occurs while saving the object to the database
      ValidationException - if the BookOrder with the passed parameters is deemed invalid

    • advanceOrderState

      void advanceOrderState(Long orderId, Long userId, RentalState newState) throws ServiceException
      Sets new state for BookOrder in the database
      Parameters:
      orderId - id of the BookOrder in the database
      userId - id of User that is changing the state
      newState - state to set
      Throws:
      ServiceException - if a DaoException occurs

    • getOrderById

      BookOrder getOrderById(Long id) throws ServiceException
      Gets the BookOrder with the specified id
      Parameters:
      id - id of the desired order
      Returns:
      BookOrder object from the database
      Throws:
      ServiceException - if no BookOrder was found that had the specified id

    • getSpecifiedOrders

      List<BookOrder> getSpecifiedOrders(Specification<BookOrder> bookOrderSpecification, Comparator<BookOrder> comparator) throws ServiceException
      Returns BookOrders from the database, which fit the passed specification, in a List sorted with the passed Comparator
      Parameters:
      bookOrderSpecification - specification that the orders have to fit
      comparator - comparator that the specified orders will be sorted by
      Returns:
      a sorted List containing the specified orders
      Throws:
      ServiceException - if a DaoException occurs
